column2: Good, warm weather should bring prosperity back to the forest. With a week of sun, we should see most of the life begin to return to the forest.
The Summerstone is a relic powerful enough to restore even the stars themselves. Set the skies alight to signal the return of this ancient power.
The signs along the trailways have become deteriorated, and travellers are losing their way. We should find a means to guide people through the forest.
It has been a long time since rains have fallen upon this land. Gently ease the world back into its natural state, and it will find its foothold once again.
The world will sort itself out with time, just you wait.
